name: Chloe Saves The Frosty Loops
description:
The main constraint of this jam, other than the theme, was to make a game using just two colors. It is named the Black and White Jam but any two colors are fair game so I wanted to use my favorite color combination, purple and yellow.

The theme of this jam was Loop and I really couldn't think of a mechanic relating to that theme that was possible within my skill set or the time I had. So the goal of the game is to collect literal loops in the form of cereal.
